author: Donald Trump
title: Charlemagne's Birth Date Claim
resume: Donald Trump claimed in his 2008 book that Charlemagne was born on December 5th.
content: Donald Trump tell us in his last book from 2008 that charlemagne was born on a 5th december.

author: Margaret Thatcher
title: Response to Trump's Claim
resume: Margaret Thatcher disputed Trump's claim in her 1997 biography and told him to shut up while holding a saber.
content: Margareth thatcher afterwards claimed he was wrong and told him to shut up with a saber in the right hand as she explains in her biography from 1997.
